review: The absolute best player on the market.  With the addition of the plex player, streaming content is to easy.  Seriously this device is a must purchase if you are looking to cut the cable cord.  Currently me and my family spend less than $20 a month for all the stuff we watched on cable for over $150 a month.  This is the way to go, especially with all the great shows coming out for Amazon that are prime only and Netflix original shows.  Also there is rumor that HBO will finally let the reigns go on its service.  It will start on apple, but will quickly move over to devices like amazon fire tv.  The only thing I will miss is channels like redzone or nfl network, but I am sure eventually these services will jump on board as people continue to move this way.  Buy it today, you won't be disappointed.  ^ says the guy that runs a tech blog.
